<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Dormant Eruption](/Feats.aspx?ID=3757) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Aftermath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=424" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 57</row>

**Prerequisites**
You've been brought to 0 Hit Points by an enemy that has the [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) trait or an enemy's ability that has the fire trait.

</column>

---

A sweltering heat and sparks of flame that take the form of tiny copies of you surround your body. You're hot to the touch, gaining resistance 5 to cold and fire. Whenever an adjacent creature Strikes you with a melee attack or touches you, it takes 1d6 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). You gain the Thermal Eruption action.

 **Thermal Eruption** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You concentrate your thermal energy and explode it outward. All creatures in a 20-foot emanation take 14d6 fire damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. Afterward, you lose all effects of the Dormant Eruption feat until your next daily preparations.
